title: Clipboard text missing from queue view
description: Clipboard items are not visible in the queue list in some scenarios. Diagnose and ensure copied text reliably appears in the UI, even when the window is hidden or the app is inactive.
progress_note: Monitoring now stays active while window is hidden; timer scheduled in common modes. Manual verification pending.

title: Liquid Glass UI refresh for macOS 26
description: Update queue and preferences UI to use macOS 26 Tahoe Liquid Glass materials, modern spacing/typography, and current HIG guidance.

title: Enable Dock icon with app asset
description: Remove menu-bar-only configuration and ensure the app appears in the Dock with a proper app icon.

title: Add search bar with real-time filtering
description: Provide a search field that filters clipboard items live with debounce for responsiveness.

title: Categories with color coding
description: Allow users to create categories, assign items, and display color-coded indicators in the list.

title: History view
description: Maintain a persistent history of clipboard items separate from the queue.

title: Pin items for persistence
description: Add pinning so important items stay at the top and persist across restarts.

title: Show source app icons
description: Capture the source app and show its icon for each clipboard item; fallback gracefully when unavailable.

title: Scale to millions of items
description: Optimize data storage, rendering, and search to handle millions of clipboard items without crashing or lag.

title: Expand settings customization
description: Add settings for monitoring behavior, appearance, history retention, and animation speed.

title: Context menus for list and items
description: Provide right-click context menus with actions like copy, pin, delete, categorize.

title: Smooth animations with speed control
description: Ensure list animations run at 60fps and add a setting to adjust speed.

title: Responsive layout for all window sizes
description: Adapt layout and typography for small and large window sizes without truncation.
